ExecutiveSummary.one_line: Conflict-managed telemedicine rollout balancing coverage, continuity, and quality of care.

bullets.item: Clinical pathways preserving continuity and safety.
Equity measures for device access and literacy.

SynthesizedConclusion.KeyFinding: Bandwidth-tiered modality routing and offline options.
Referral and follow-up protocols ensuring continuity.
SynthesizedConclusion.RiskAssessment: Subsidized devices and coaching for vulnerable groups.
